programme.desc: The Jungle Rooster - When the Jungle Rooster keeps him up at night, Julien discovers that the Foosa have been farming chickens for food and risks his life to free them all

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep47
programme.desc: Rupert And The Beehive - During a big thunderstorm in Nutwood, the swarm of bees lose their home. Bill badger attempts to reconstruct their hive with the help of his tool box but unfortunately it falls to pieces. With another thunderstorm looming, will the bees get a new home in time?

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep48
programme.desc: Rupert And The Lost Bird - Rupert is off to join his friends in the wood, where he learns that Raggety has just heard the most extraordinary bird-song - from presumably an unusual bird. What is it doing in Nutwood? Bill learns that many birds migrate from the Far South to spend the summer in the Far Far North. The unusual visitor must have been doing so but got lost and cut off from its flock. Rupert determines that they should help the lost bird on its way. Thanks to Ming and Rupert's car, they are finally able to do so...

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep47
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S New Games - Raa Raa is in a playful mood and sets off to find his friends. Together they incorporate everybody's game, to make one noisy, fun filled new game.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep48
programme.desc: Raa Raa Can Do It - Raa Raa is in an overly helpful mood and his other friends start to feel excluded… will Raa Raa realise the error of his ways and let the others help too?

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep21
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Space Suit - It's a snowy day in Greendale, and Ted Glen has invited the kids to his workshop to meet his friend, space expert Professor Farrow. Julian's excited but so is Pat, who has always yearned to be an astronaut. He's even more thrilled when he finds that his special delivery is a space suit - an extra surprise for the kids. When his van breaks down in a snowy lane, he finds an ingenious solution - only to suffer a puncture - and Ted is unable to help... Meanwhile, Professor Farrow and Lauren take the kids out into the snow and re-create the surface of the moon. Pat's determined to make his delivery, but how will he make it on foot through the snow? As the kids perfect their snowy “moon”, a space-suited figure approaches - Pat in the space suit. Mission Accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep22
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Stormy Birthday - It's Chris Beacon's birthday and he's looking forward to spending the day onshore and having a party at the village hall. Pat's SDS mission is to pick up all the presents from everyone who won't be able to be at the party later. The kids and Lauren are working on decorating the village hall and making Ben a big card from them all whilst Nisha and Ajay provide special birthday cakes for Chris and Micawber and Alf and Dorothy send over lovely fresh eggs and cheese and a special homemade woolly jumper. Meanwhile, the weather is getting worse out at Pencaster Lighthouse and Chris realises, sadly, that he'll have to stay and man the lighthouse and make sure that the passing boats are protected. He won't be able to join everyone for his birthday after all! But Pat has a great idea – if Chris can't come to the birthday party, the birthday party can come to him! With the help of the SDS helicopter Pat delivers all of Chris's birthday presents directly to him at the lighthouse! Everyone contacts Chris by video conference so that even if they can't be there, he's not alone on his birthday! Special delivery service – mission accomplished!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep99
programme.desc: Poppy'S Big Race - It is the day of the annual Flowertot Race. Poppy is reluctant to enter as she always loses her way. Fifi and Bumble help her train for the big race, but will she win?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep100
programme.desc: Blueberry Hunt - Fifi and Bumble are off to pick all the ripe blueberries off the bush. But when they get there all the berries have disappeared. Who could have taken them?

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep47
programme.desc: Crouching Tiger Hidden Yeti - The gang’s efforts to help JJ master the ancient martial art of Blamjitsu are thwarted by Walter’s plans to capture the Beanotown Yeti – whom they all think is a Blamjitsu Master, and guardian of the mystical Gloop of Greatness. Dennis and the gang defend the Yeti, and help JJ unleash her Inner Blam, in a gravity-defying martial arts face-off with the WilburCorp Henchbot.

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep48
programme.desc: Double Crust - Crusty the Robot Pie Spy has been hacked by Doctor Pfooflepfeffer and is sending her photos of Screwtop’s latest inventions so she can claim them as her own. The gang expose her scheme by getting Crusty to “leak” blueprints of the most terrible inventions they can think of.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep24
programme.desc: Stayin' Alive - Allura returns to the Balmera to gather a giant crystal when a familiar foe reawakens

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep24
programme.desc: Amazamoose And Squirrel Wonder: Chapter Three - The mystery goop strikes again when Rocky’s stress ball falls into a vat of goop, making it sentient and gigantic! Now the stress ball is bouncing through New York City, getting bigger and bigger.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep24
programme.desc: Dome Sweet Dome / My Pet Clamsquatch - Chet accidentally trades all of the town's tomatoes to the devious Ace Gecko and the FAST crew has to outsmart the lizard in order to get them back. // Skidmark has been secretly keeping a clamsquatch as a pet and it's up to the crew to protect the creature from a nefarious secret organization.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep19
programme.desc: Towaconstrictors - Revvit maps a path to a magical forest where the Dinotrux can explore and have fun, but once they arrive the crew is startled by Towaconstrictors

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep19
programme.desc: The Chair Museum / The Legend Of Crackerfoot - Archibald's plan to help Sage recover his beloved rocking chair hits a snag. Archibald and his siblings scour the woods for the legendary Crackerfoot.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep19
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Shadowy Syndrome Of The Sinister Splotch - Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. George and Harold, positive it's an impostor, try to track down the perp and bring him to justice. But can the boys do this before Captain Underpants is found guilty?

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Fugitive’S Day Out - Boss Baby is framed for leaking info about the Stinkless Serum to PuppyCo and must flee on the run via Errand Day with the family

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep19
programme.desc: The Battle(S) Of Gongmen Bay - Po and the Kids agree to escort a dirigible shipment of food to a drought-torn region of China. But Nu Hai has some suspicions about Shi Long, which she finds aren't far off when she discovers the dirigible is set to explode...with them on board!

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep45
programme.desc: Bad Luck Branch/ Gem Day - Branch becomes convinced he has bad luck, and endeavors to reverse his fortunes./ It is Branch’s Gem day (an important day during which he will be presented with his unique ‘Gem’), and Poppy wants to make sure everything goes perfectly. Unfortunately, she loses Branch’s gem, and must recruit her friends to help her find it again.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep20
programme.desc: Freepy Friday - Grug and Eep get into an argument and end up switching places to prove how hard it is to the other to be them. We follow Eep as the parent and Grug as the teenager at school and at home

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep19
programme.desc: Le Grand Derriere / I'M Your Boovest Fan - Lucy changes after becoming the first human-chef at a fancy Boov restaurant; Oh is an obsessed superfan of a tee-ball team and uses Boov-tech to cheat.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Lucky And The Golden Opportunity - When the PALs find gold, things spiral out of control until Lucky and Spirit have to rescue their friends from the bottom of a mine!

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Treasure Riders - When a swashbuckling adventurer named Waldondo comes to town, the Riders enthusiastically join him on a treasure hunt for a priceless gem.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep11
programme.desc: Why Frog Croaks - You see there was a time when Frog didn't croak. Frog sang like a bird… and the birds didn't like it. Birds were the masters of song and that's the way it should be! So the birds trick poor old Frog into a singing duel and sing and sing and sing… until poor old Frog's voice is reduced to a rebbit. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep12
programme.desc: Why Spider Has A Tiny Waist - You see there was a time when Spider didn't have a tiny waist. She was all big and round… and did she like her food! One day greedy Spider hears of Four Feasts in Tinga Tinga and she wanted to go to them all! So she spun four threads and attached them to various animals going to the feasts. But the Monkeys, Frog, Hippo and the Bees all set off in different directions – North, South, East and West – and Spider's thread soon runs out. EEeeek! The threads get tighter and tighter and tighter, making Spider's smaller and smaller and smaller! Luckily the threads break, but from that day on Spider has always had a tiny waist. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep11
programme.desc: The Case Of The Broken Toy Wash - Fuse is heartbroken when his new special toy wash is broken. Right before Revs could have a wash in it too! Noddy decides to investigate and help the little robot find out who has broken it. Using all his investigating skills and collecting evidence with the WhoWhatWhere Tablet Noddy realises that it's his own best beloved car, Revs, who broke the toy wash! Poor Revs thought that if he went through the toy wash he'd miss his special time with Noddy and Bumpy. Noddy finds a way for Revs to enjoy the toy wash AND still has his special playtime with his best friends. Clever Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep12
programme.desc: The Case Of The Dazzle Dragon - Everyone in Fable Fields is very worried that a new Dazzle Dragon has appeared in the land. Big Ears says there's no such thing as a Dragon in Toyland so Noddy decides to investigate. All the evidence seems to lead to a dragon – footprints, loud noises and glimpses of shiny scales in the woods but clever Noddy thinks it through and, using his investigating skills of looking and looking again, soon realises that the ‘dragon' isn't a dragon at all! It's the knights out on patrol in their shiny armour and tight formation! Phew! Thanks Noddy!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep11
programme.desc: What'S My Favourite Thing About Spring? - Mimi has promised Jess a special surprise if he can work out what he likes best about the Spring… He finds out that there's blossom on the trees, fresh new grass, bright young flowers in the Springtime. But he decides his very favorite thing is the newly hatched very cute little baby birds which his friend Little Bird has been singing about all along.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep12
programme.desc: How Can I Hide Without Being Found? - Willow is the best hide-and-seek finder! Jess is determined to work out a way of hiding without Willow finding him! A trip to the pond where he discovers that both Horace and Sammy Snail are camouflaged leads him to work out that he too can do the same to hide from Willow at last!

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep49
programme.desc: Rupert And The Sailing Race - Whilst down at the stream with Rupert and Co, the fox twins mis-read the words to one of Ping Pong's spells which causes everyone to shrink. Delighted with their new size and ignoring warnings from Rupert, the twins leap into their toy boat and immediately sail into danger. Can Rupert, Ping Pong, Edward and Bill rescue them before they capsize or drift under the bridge and out to sea?

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep50
programme.desc: Rupert And The Flying Dragon - Rupert tries to help Ming to fly by attaching a balloon to him. But the wind blows and Ming is carried away. Rupert and Bill try and chase after Ming, while Ping Pong, unaware of what's going on, works with Edward and Raggety to make a proper flying spell for baby dragons. This is soon abandoned though when Ming is blown out to sea, and Rupert has to come and asking Pong for help. The friends leap in the flying car and chase after Ming, as she floats helplessly around Nutwood. Finally, its Raggety's magic that saves the day, and Ming is safely rescued. The friends agree to wait until Ming's older before helping her to fly… and give her an airborne ride in Rupert's flying car instead!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep49
programme.desc: Crocky'S Coconut - Crocky has entrusted Raa Raa with his very special coconut to look after. Raa Raa does his very best to keep it safe. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep50
programme.desc: Kings And Queens Of The Jungle - Topsy takes a game of Kings and Queens too seriously and starts to boss the other animals around. The animals don't want to play with her anymore, can Topsy help them change their mind?

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep23
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Winter Games - The children are excited as there's a big Winter Snowdown on the fells. There's a snowman building competition, followed by a race down the snowy hill! Pat's Special Delivery is a consignment of deflated inner tubes for them to slide on, but the 4x4 hits an icy patch and slips into a ditch - and when Ted tries to rescue him, his truck gets stuck as well! On the fells competition is rife - not between the children, but with Ajay and Amy! Everyone is keen for the race to begin - but where is Pat with the inner tubes? Thanks to some cheeky sheep playing ‘follow the leader' with Jess, Pat has an idea. He and Ted pump up two of the inner tubes and Jess and the sheep pull them like huskies to the fells with the rest of the Special Delivery! Pat zooms in and saves the day - and everyone enjoys the race, including two very cheeky sheep!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep24
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Bucking Bronco - Hopes are high for this evening's hoe-down on Greendale's village green - especially among PC Selby and Ted, who each harbour hopes of dancing with Dr Gilbertson. Pat's mission is to deliver one of Ted's inventions, a mechanical horse or “bucking bronco”, to the event. But when the bronco is accidentally switched on in the back of Pat's van, it rolls away and Pat can't find a way to recapture it. He enlists Amy's help, but jealous Pumpkin pushes the bronco away, making matters worse. Meanwhile PC Selby and Ted are each determined to be the best banjo-playing dancers Greendale (or more specifically, Dr Gilbertson) has ever seen… Pat has a great idea to catch the escaped bronco, using Dr Gilbertson's lasso-throwing skills. As Pat drives her sports car, Dr G throws the lasso - and captures the mechanical horse just in time. As she does a celebratory dance with both PC Selby and Ted, Pat is the toast of the hoe-down. Mission Accomplished!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep101
programme.desc: Snowtime For Pip - All Pip wants to do is play in the snow. Fifi tries to help him out, and come up with a brilliant idea how they can without it actually snowing!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep419
programme.desc: Mr Fox's Van - When Daddy Pig needs a new watch, Mr Fox finds three grandfather clocks in the back of his van. Three clocks are much better than one. Mr Fox has everything in his van – even a chicken!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep420
programme.desc: Chloe's Big Friends - Peppa and George go to play with Cousin Chloe and her friends, but the older children don't want to play any "baby" games.

programme.desc: Gym Class - Madame Gazelle takes the children to Grampy Rabbit's gym class, where at first they think all the stuff to do is scary, but Grampy Rabbit tells the kids about how he explored a jungle, helping the kids get over their fears.

programme.desc: The Stones of Power - When Santiago and his crew race to protect the magical Stones of Power from being taken by Bonnie Bones, they discover more than they bargained for. Luckily, they receive a little help from their hero -- Capitán Calavera!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Sleeping Like a Baby - Baby sleeps in his parents' bed and loves it so much, he tries to make it a permanent arrangement.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S05 Ep520
programme.desc: Fogzilla! - It's Lighthouse Keeper Deema's birthday! But when a monster named Fogzilla keeps blowing out her lighthouse, she needs to figure out how to get Captain Molly's ship, carrying her birthday cake, to shore, or there won't be a party!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S05 Ep521
programme.desc: Bigfoot Crossing! - On the hottest day of the year, it's Park Rangers Goby and Gil's job to make sure that pedestrians can make it safely to the lake to swim. But when Bigfoot swipes the park's stop signs, will anyone be able to cross the road for a dip?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep302
programme.desc: The Rainbow - Peppa and her family spot a rainbow when they go for a drive.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Pedro's Cough - Pedro gets a contagious cough at daycare and other children soon catch it. When it's time to go the grown-ups catch it too, including Madame Gazelle. Doctor Brown Bear gives them terrible-tasting medicine, but who will look after him when he is sick?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep304
programme.desc: The Library - Daddy Pig has a book from the library that he has kept for too long. The family go to the library to return it and find more books to read.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep305
programme.desc: The Camper Van - Peppa and her family go on vacation in a special van. Peppa is surprised to find that at a push of a button the van converts into a mini-house for them to sleep in!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep155
programme.desc: Ron's Sunburn - Ron has gotten a terrible sunburn and is too embarrassed to come outside and play with his friends. They try everything they can think of to get him to play with them. They even try tempting him with Froga's freshly baked cookies!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep156
programme.desc: Bubu's Portrait - Anna is painting a beautiful portrait of Bubu as a surprise gift. As she is missing a colour, she leaves the painting in the meadow for a moment. Meanwhile, Christopher arrives and finds the abandoned painting, he decides to take it to Bubu's.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep106
programme.desc: It's Only a Mystery... - Taking after his favourite detective, Barbabravo looks for a case to solve. Can he solve the mystery of the missing ice statue?

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep123
programme.desc: Barba TV / The Museum - The barbababies are glued to the TV. Since they love it so much, their parents encourage them to make their own shows. // The Barbapapa visit the museum of evolution. On the program: creation of the Earth, Precambrian submarine and... dinosaurs!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep601
programme.desc: Werewolves of Bubbledon! - On Halloween eve in the foggy town of Bubbledon, everyone is nervous because there's a werewolf on the loose! Monster Detectives Molly, Gil and Dr. Pupson are on the case, but will they find the critter before Halloween is cancelled?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep303
programme.desc: No Time Like The Present Store - At the Present Store, Joe's running a contest, whoever guesses the mystery present gets to unwrap it! What could be inside this special gift?! We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep601
programme.desc: Big Rig to the Rescue! - When three big deliveries are needed all over Axle City, there's only one monster machine with the power to haul it all: Big Rig Blaze! But even Big Rig Blaze may not be able to make all the deliveries in time.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep602
programme.desc: The Amazing Stunt Kitty - When a big stunt goes awry, Darington is sent flying away on an out-of-control balloon! Now, it's up to Blaze, AJ, and Darington's sidekick Stunt Kitty to save the day!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Were wig on the the loose / Lights Camera Action - When Sir Steel's high-tech wig malfunctions and goes on the rampage in Platinum City the Deer Squad race to the rescue. // The Deer Squad must think fast to save Lady Fluffpot when Sir Steel's filming turns into a Disaster Movie!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Paddington's not Himself - Paddington has a fall and loses his climbing confidence - without climbing he doesn't feel like himself at all - what can he do?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Paddington's First Snow / Paddington and the Metal Detector - It's snowing in Windsor Gardens; Paddington has lost a special wooly hat given him by Aunt Lucy and must find it. // Paddington is given a Metal detector by Mr. Gruber. Beep beep beep what has Paddington found now?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep126
programme.desc: Paddington Runs the Café / Paddington Makes a Film - Paddington says he will watch the cafe, so Matteo can play with Jonathan and Judy in the park. // Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a film camera to record his adventures in Windsor Gardens to send to Aunt Lucy in the retired home for Bears in Lima.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Work and Play - When Peppa and Suzy learn that grown ups must work all day, they decide to play at working in a store. But they quickly get tired of it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep302
programme.desc: The Rainbow - Peppa and her family spot a rainbow when they go for a drive.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Pedro's Cough - Pedro gets a contagious cough at daycare and other children soon catch it. When it's time to go the grown-ups catch it too, including Madame Gazelle. Doctor Brown Bear gives them terrible-tasting medicine, but who will look after him when he is sick?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep304
programme.desc: The Library - Daddy Pig has a book from the library that he has kept for too long. The family go to the library to return it and find more books to read.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S05 Ep512
programme.desc: Ninja Season! - Gil wants to be a ninja! But his ninja teacher just keeps giving him random tasks to do. Frustrated, Gil is about to give up, when another ninja challenges him, and he realizes he's been learning ninja skills all along!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep306
programme.desc: A Blue's Clues Festival of Lights - Everyone's at Periwinkle's house celebrating Hanukkah, the festival of lights! Well, not everyone, exactly. There's a special, surprise guest coming to our Hanukkah party, and we'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep307
programme.desc: Blue's Snowy Day Surprise - There are SNOW many great things to do on a snowy day like today, but Blue's surprise may be the best! We'll play a wintry game of Blue's Clues to figure out what her surprise is.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep601
programme.desc: Werewolves of Bubbledon! - On Halloween eve in the foggy town of Bubbledon, everyone is nervous because there's a werewolf on the loose! Monster Detectives Molly, Gil and Dr. Pupson are on the case, but will they find the critter before Halloween is cancelled?

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Lorelai's Bracelet / Cecelia And The Ghost Ship - Bonnie steals Lorelai's bracelet, turning herself into a mermaid and while trapping Lorelai in human form! // Santi and crew must overcome ghostly shenanigans to save Cecilia from the dreaded Ghost Ship

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Sink or Swim - The Sharks go on the family game show Sink or Swim and find they're in hot water with their competition, the Fishes.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep726
programme.desc: Pups save Thundermouth / Pups Save a Class Pet - Shortly after listening to the story of Thundermouth, the pups are on a mission to save elephants spooked by a scary noise. // Mayor Goodway is left in charge of a class pet, but the hamster escapes! Now it's up to the Paw Patrol to save the pet.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Paddington Saves the Bees / Paddington & the Heat Wave - Paddington learns about bees & decides to help them make honey by planting a flower garden but someone thinks they're weeds! // There's a heatwave in Windsor Gardens & Mateo has sold out of ice-creams so he and Paddington create a new flavor!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep422
programme.desc: The Blackberry Bush - Peppa and her family collect apples and blackberries in Granny and Grandpa Pig's garden to make a pie.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep423
programme.desc: Pottery - Mrs Zebra teaches Peppa, George, Zoe, Zaza and Zuzu Zebra how to make a real tea set from clay.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep424
programme.desc: Paper Aeroplanes - Some of Daddy Pig's important work papers have gone missing – because Mummy Pig, Peppa and George have accidentally made them into paper airplanes.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep155
programme.desc: Ron's Sunburn - Ron has gotten a terrible sunburn and is too embarrassed to come outside and play with his friends. They try everything they can think of to get him to play with them. They even try tempting him with Froga's freshly baked cookies!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep156
programme.desc: Bubu's Portrait - Anna is painting a beautiful portrait of Bubu as a surprise gift. As she is missing a colour, she leaves the painting in the meadow for a moment. Meanwhile, Christopher arrives and finds the abandoned painting, he decides to take it to Bubu's.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep78
programme.desc: Up Down, Down Up - Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po drive the Tubby Car to the Hidey Hup where they discover the Tubby Uppy Downy. They have fun going up down, down up!

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S3) Ep3
programme.desc: Top - Dee encourages a friend to say 'top' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see lots of different tops - a new top, a soft top, a scratchy top and some matchy tops!

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep77
programme.desc: All Out Cook Out - Bo's uncle cooks outdoors to make their evening meal.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) Ep37
programme.desc: It's time to make a rocket - Inspired by Captain Chloe, JoJo learns about astronauts and how they travelled through space to the moon.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep65
programme.desc: Cousin Flora - Monty becomes confused when playing with his cousin Flora when he learns that they play differently to one another.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep64
programme.desc: Car Trip - Monty is surprised that his mum doesn't find her job exciting, and wonders if things become dull if you do them every day.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep15
programme.desc: Butterflies - Playing 'Butterflies' in the backyard is great fun, until Bluey runs away with Judo leaving Bingo all alone. Now poor Bingo's heartbroken and Bluey needs to make amends.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep44
programme.desc: The Board Game Badge - It is a rainy day in the clubhouse which means it's a perfect day for a board game. Duggee introduces the Squirrels to one of his favourite games.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep43
programme.desc: The Soap Opera Badge - After breaking the Chickens' TV aerial during the finale of their favourite soap opera, the Squirrels take it upon themselves to recreate the final episode for them.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep42
programme.desc: The Mythical Creature Badge - The Squirrels find a hidden book about mythical creatures. They learn and discover a wide range of mythical creatures, create their own and find out why the book was hidden in the first place.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep24
programme.desc: Valley Of The Balls, Kazakhstan - Can the Go Jetters take control of a rocky situation in the Valley of Balls?

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep23
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Hurricane Rescue - Grandmaster Glitch tries to rescue a Grimbot from an Atlantic hurricane. The Go Jetters have to rescue him!

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep14
programme.desc: Takeaway - Forced to wait five minutes in front of a restaurant for their takeaway, Bluey and Bingo become restless for entertainment, pushing the very limits of Dad's patience.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep13
programme.desc: Spy Game - When Bingo stops playing Bluey's spy game, their grown-up controlling device stops working properly! Bluey now sees how important Bingo is and needs to win her back!

programme.title: Andy's Prehistoric Adventures (S1) Ep23
programme.desc: Basilosaurus & Barnacles - Andy collects barnacles from a prehistoric ocean for his new museum display.

programme.title: Grace's Amazing Machines (S1) Ep13
programme.desc: Home Machines - Grace goes for a sail in a solar-powered canal boat, shows off the incredible International Space Station and goes for a drive in a motorhome.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S8) Ep18
programme.desc: Proper Pirate Proficiency Test - Captain Captain is wearing her Proper Pirate Proficiency badge and Seaweed realises he doesn't have one! He discovers he will have to pass the Proper Pirate Proficiency Test or he'll have to leave the crew!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep41
programme.desc: The Puzzle Badge - The Squirrels are close to finishing a jigsaw puzzle when the Naughty Mice steal their last piece!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep40
programme.desc: The Training Badge - Duggee struggles to organise the Squirrels in order of height and keeping them focused on the task. Sounds like the Squirrels need some training to improve their concentration.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep38
programme.desc: The Bridge Badge - It's bridge building time... the squirrels help a quarrelling group of Gerbils sort out their longstanding disagreement.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep22
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Biogas Power - Greener fuel spells trouble for Glitch.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep21
programme.desc: Tepui Mountains, Venezuela - Xuli and Glitch need rescuing from a sinkhole.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S14) Ep17
programme.desc: Thomas and Scruff - Thomas decides that it is high time new engine Scruff took a bath.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) Ep33
programme.desc: Whatsathingy - Sarah & Duck try to work out exactly what it is that Scarf Lady has been busily knitting in her sleep.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) Ep32
programme.desc: Comet's Coming - Sarah & Duck are excited to visit the observatory to see a passing comet.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep49
programme.desc: Music Show - On a very hot day, everyone has their windows open and they're all playing music...

programme.title: Charlie and Lola (S3) Ep22
programme.desc: But Where Completely Are We? - Charlie and Lola camp out in the garden. Charlie loves the adventure, but Lola feels uneasy. Her big brother has just the solution.

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep32
programme.desc: The Thing That Was Stuck - Gwen and Tony try and help Bon who is stuck up a tree.

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep31
programme.desc: The Thing That Followed - Gwen, Bob and Tony meet a new little Dinopaw who comes to join in their game of tag.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep12

programme.desc: The Buddy Badge - Duggee hosts a Buddy Bonanza for Mrs Weaver and the Squirrels, with the aim of finding new buddies with common interests to them.

programme.desc: The Diplomacy Badge - Betty and Sargent Ant just want perfection, but no one seems to be listening to their shouting! They need a lesson in diplomacy to learn how to speak in a more sensitive way.

programme.desc: The Senses Badge - Roly has lost his best potato but Duggee finds it using his sense of smell. But what is a sense? Time for the Squirrels to learn about the five senses and earn their Senses Badge.

programme.desc: Tower Bridge, London - Grandmaster Glitch is visiting London and spots the perfect souvenir hat. But he's run out of pocket money, so he decides to earn some as a tour guide.

programme.desc: Barbecue Brawl/Cat Napping/Hic-Cup Pup/Jerry and the Lion/Love that Pup/Nit-Witty Kitty/Puss Gets The Boot/That's My Pup - Spike tries to ensure that Tom doesn't ruin his father-son barbeque.

programme.title: Unikitty Ep82/Ep49/Ep6/Ep28/Ep75
programme.desc: Grown Up Stuff/Camp Unikitty/Little Prince Puppycorn/Kickflip Mcpuppycorn/Growing Pains - Puppycorn doesn't want to grow up. To ease his woes, Unikitty spends the day teaching him all the fun things about being an adult.

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls Ep102/Ep169/Ep210/Ep134/Ep175
programme.desc: Horn, Sweet Horn/Bridezilla/The Gift/Odd Bubbles Out/A Slight Hiccup - Bubbles convinces the Professor to test his new transmogrifying ray on her new friend Danny the Pony in an effort to help him become the unicorn.

programme.title: Ben 10 Ep127/Ep166/Ep206/Ep228/Ep262
programme.desc: Xingo/The Charm Offensive/The Chupaca-Bro/What Rhymes With Omnitrix?/Players Of The Lost Park - Xingo brings chaos when he leaps from his dimension to ours.

programme.title: Chowder Ep3B/Ep35B/Ep14A/Ep45A
programme.desc: Stinky Love/The Blackout/The Bruised Bluenana/The Heist - Kimchi whisks one of Mung's smelliest dishes away to a romantic setting on top of the catering company.

programme.title: Inspector Gadget Ep203B/Ep208B/Ep213B/Ep218B/Ep223B
programme.desc: Baking Bad/Metro City's Sinking/The Truth is Under There/Panda-monium/MADtrack - When Talon sneaks into HQ disguised as a Sweetie Scout, Gadget gives the Scouts a thrilling tour of the building. Meanwhile, Penny struggles with her most difficult mission yet: baking.

programme.title: Foster's Home For Imaginary Friends Ep26/Ep2
programme.desc: My So Called Wife/House of Bloo's Part 2 - When a wealthy benefactor visits Foster's, he mistakenly thinks Coco is Herriman's lovely wife and invites them to his mansion for a charity gala. Herriman must now train Coco to be a high-society lady.

programme.title: Unikitty Ep28/Ep50/Ep83/Ep67/Ep102
programme.desc: Kickflip Mcpuppycorn/Hawkodile Sensei/Old Lady Bodyguard/Volcano/The Unikingdom Awards - When Unikitty and the gang help Puppycorn impress his skater friends by helping him pull off impossible moves, they do their job too well.

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls Ep103/Ep170/Ep211/Ep133/Ep174
programme.desc: The Stayover/Phantasm Chasm/Brain Freeze/Electric Buttercup/The Buttercup Job - After going overboard on the candy Blossom and Buttercup wake up with no memory of last night and no idea where Bubbles is!

programme.title: Ben 10 Ep128/Ep167/Ep207/Ep229/Ep263
programme.desc: Drive You Crazy/Super-Villain Team-Up/Buggy Out/You Remind Me Of Someone/De-Fanged - After the Rust Bucket breaks down at a Mobile Home Park, Ben discovers they've stumbled on to the last leg of the Cali 10 Hundred, an epic, off-road auto race.

programme.desc: Big Scare In The Big Easy/Safari, So Goodi - Scooby and the gang try to find the truth behind the appearance of two civil war ghosts who have come to life to re-enact a past battle.

programme.title: Esme & Roy Ep229/Ep225
programme.desc: Can’T Touch This/An Open Book - Fig wants to touch everything, including things are too dangerous for a baby. Can Esme and Roy find something appropriate for Fig to play with?

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep29
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: Road To UFC Ep1
programme.desc: ROAD TO UFC is a ground-breaking “win and advance” tournament that gives top MMA prospects from Asia a pathway to a UFC contract. Eight mixed martial arts athletes will compete in each of four men’s weight classes: flyweight, bantamweight, featherweight and lightweight. The opening round is divided into four episodes, each of which includes four tournament bouts and one additional non-tournament bout. These non-tournament bouts are included for promising prospects whose divisions might not have been included in ROAD TO UFC.
